name: abdicate
content:
abdicate verb
(KING/QUEEN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] If a king or queen abdicates, he or she makes a formal statement that he or she no longer wants to be king or queen: King Edward VIII abdicated (the British throne) in 1936.
